name: DiscoBallScreensaverforEchoShow
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: disco ball
des:
Disco Ball Screensaver HD on your Echo Show or Echo Spot device (required a screen). This skill plays a big colorful disco ball with no audio on your Echo Show or Echo Spot. Great fun for your living room, kitchen or bedroom! 

+ Ask "Alexa, open disco ball" to open skill. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
